title: What Is the Purpose of the HTML <meta> Tag?
answer_1: To define a section of a web page.
answer_2: To add a link to an external stylesheet.
answer_3: To specify metadata about the document.
right_answer: To specify metadata about the document.

title: What Is the Role of the HTML <header> Element?
answer_1: To mark a section of text as important.
answer_2: To define a container for navigation links.
answer_4: To enclose the main content of a web page.
right_answer: To define a container for navigation links.
